version_description:
After more than 2 months since the release of version 4.0, we would like to introduce you to the latest version of Tidio Chat. Fully packed with the following great features:
* The ability to login via e-mail (without having to enter passwords)
* Newly improved login screen
* File upload capabilities
* Ability to send/view images in the chat window
* Service logs
* Enhanced stability of the application
* Preview of what the user is typing in real-time
* Information when another operator is typing
* Support for departments

After more than 2 months since the release of version 4.0, we would like to introduce you to the latest version of Tidio Chat. Fully packed with the following great features:

* Ability to send/view images in the chat window
* Service logs
* Enhanced stability of the application
* Preview of what the user is typing in real-time
* Information when another operator is typing
* Support for departments

* Speed up connecting with chat
* Header in chat view with visitor info
* Tags support

* Header in chat view with visitor info
* Tags support

The new version of app includes full support of the new Tidio Chat panel, implements refreshed appearance and adds a number of core features.

Key changes include:
* New, refreshed appearance
* Search option available
* Support of new channels - email and text
* New option to open and close conversations
* Ability to merge users

New year, new me, new update. The new version of Tidio Chat app includes a revised flow of conversation, new login window, refreshed conversations menu and a couple of cool options in the conversation menu.

Key changes include:
* New conversation flow
* Refreshed conversation window
* New login and menu screen
* New options in the active conversation

Take a look, the new version of Tidio Chat has a couple of really cool, new features. We've also refreshed some of the core elements of our app:

* freshly new, state-of-the-art interface
* ban a visitor feature
* sign up / log in with Facebook option
* full integration with Messenger
* fully editable operator profile
* improved synchronization between platforms
* magic link replaced with the Reset password button

Take a look, the new version of Tidio Chat has a couple of really cool, new features. We've also refreshed some of the core elements of our app:

* freshly new, state-of-the-art interface
* ban a visitor feature
* sign up / log in with Facebook option
* full integration with Messenger
* fully editable operator profile
* improved synchronization between platforms
* magic link replaced with the Reset password button

Welcome to the newest version of Tidio Chat! Keeping in touch with your customers is now easier than ever. See what we’ve got in store for you this time:

* resending undelivered messages is now available
* improvements in attaching and sending multiple files at once
* additional chat settings are available in the conversation list
* adjusting notifications settings is now available
* improved display of authorization form on bigger displays
* improved errors hints related to the authorization form

Welcome to the newest version of Tidio Chat! Keeping in touch with your customers is now easier than ever. See what we’ve got in store for you this time:

* resending undelivered messages is now available
* improvements in attaching and sending multiple files at once
* additional chat settings are available in the conversation list
* adjusting notifications settings is now available
* improved display of authorization form on bigger displays
* improved errors hints related to the authorization form

Check out the latest version of Tidio Chat app. See what we’ve got in store for you this time:

* New feature - Test notification option - make sure your notifications are working well.
* Socket connection bar visible only when you fail to send a message
* Outbound messages feature available for 10% of chat projects
* App now supports the upcoming Bot messages feature

Check out the latest version of Tidio Chat app. See what we’ve got in store for you this time:

* New feature - Test notification option - make sure your notifications are working well.
* Socket connection bar visible only when you fail to send a message
* Outbound messages feature available for 10% of chat projects
* App now supports the upcoming Bot messages feature
We’ve updated our name and logo. Also added Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy confirmation in the sign up window.
We’ve updated our name and logo. Also added Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy confirmation in the sign up window.
We work hard to deliver you a better experience. This release includes some under-the-hood changes that are difficult to notice by users, but make our app more reliable and stable.
We work hard to deliver you a better experience. This release includes some under-the-hood changes that are difficult to notice by users, but make our app more reliable and stable.
Our latest release includes a couple of UI improvements for iPhone X as well as better representation of the visitor URL location in the conversation details for all the other users.
Our latest release includes a couple of UI improvements for iPhone X as well as better representation of the visitor URL location in the conversation details for all the other users.
This release of our app supports our new feature, the Do Not Disturb mode, which will replace the offline status.
This release of our app supports our new feature, the Do Not Disturb mode, which will replace the offline status.

A new version of the Tidio Chat app is here. This release includes a new feature in the mobile app - Quick Responses. Now you can use pre-set messages, links, or even entire articles in your Quick Responses database and call upon them anytime during a chat on your mobile device.
The new version of our Tidio Chat app also supports our new feature for Shopify users - Bots.

A new version of the Tidio Chat app is here. This release includes a new feature in the mobile app - Quick Responses. Now you can use pre-set messages, links, or even entire articles in your Quick Responses database and call upon them anytime during a chat on your mobile device.
The new version of our Tidio Chat app also supports our new feature for Shopify users - Bots.
